thread.title: 2015 Ford Mustang GT Convertible Compact SUV Challenge
thread.title_full: Video: 2015 Ford Mustang GT Convertible & Compact SUV Challenge | Watch MotorWeek Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: 2015 Ford Mustang GT Convertible Compact SUV Challenge
text: In this episode, we’re lovin’ the sun in the Ford Mustang Convertible. Pat Goss gets us charged up down at Goss’ Garage. We climb behind the wheel of the 2016 Toyota Tacoma in Tacoma, Washington. Later, we'll trim down the crowded compact SUV segment as we pick today’s best.
